thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: Had a great buying experience with Erik's. One item ended up being out of stock, but they offered to replace it with a newer model for the same price. Shipping was prompt, and service was excellent. I appreciate other businesses that emphasize great customer service.
